item.title: Health care professionals and E-cigarettes
item.description: Survey research lead by Dr Jo Brett of knowledge and attitudes amongst health care professionals regarding the use of e-cigarettes as an aid to smoking cessation and cancer prevention

item.title: GDS and alcohol messages
item.description: We are using data from the Global Drug Survey to analyse the impact of different alcohol information messages across countries. Using a bayesian multivariate mixed modelling approach we are estimating posterior probabilities using partial pooling of random effects. One challenge is how to convey / report the complex results.
